Extract variable labels and names

Source: R/finalfit_internal_functions.R
extract_labels.Rd

Extract variable labels and names

extract_labels(.data)

Arguments

.data

Data frame.

Value

A data frame with three columns: first (vname), variabe names; second (vlabel), variables labels; third (vfill), variable labels and when null variable names.

Examples

colon_s %>%
  extract_labels()
#>              vname              vlabel               vfill
#> 1               id                NULL                  id
#> 2               rx                NULL                  rx
#> 3              sex                NULL                 sex
#> 4              age         Age (years)         Age (years)
#> 5         obstruct                NULL            obstruct
#> 6           perfor                NULL              perfor
#> 7           adhere                NULL              adhere
#> 8            nodes                NULL               nodes
#> 9           status                NULL              status
#> 10          differ                NULL              differ
#> 11          extent                NULL              extent
#> 12            surg                NULL                surg
#> 13           node4                NULL               node4
#> 14            time                NULL                time
#> 15      sex.factor                 Sex                 Sex
#> 16       rx.factor           Treatment           Treatment
#> 17 obstruct.factor         Obstruction         Obstruction
#> 18   perfor.factor         Perforation         Perforation
#> 19   adhere.factor           Adherence           Adherence
#> 20   differ.factor     Differentiation     Differentiation
#> 21   extent.factor    Extent of spread    Extent of spread
#> 22     surg.factor   Time from surgery   Time from surgery
#> 23    node4.factor   >4 positive nodes   >4 positive nodes
#> 24   status.factor              Status              Status
#> 25      age.factor                 Age                 Age
#> 26         loccomp                NULL             loccomp
#> 27  loccomp.factor Local complications Local complications
#> 28      time.years        Time (years)        Time (years)
#> 29        mort_5yr    Mortality 5 year    Mortality 5 year
#> 30          age.10                NULL              age.10
#> 31    mort_5yr.num                NULL        mort_5yr.num
#> 32        hospital                NULL            hospital
